DOC.brief_title: Effects Daily Almond Intake Preload Before Meals Versus Snack Among Korean Adults
DOC.detailed_description: The current study conduct investigate effect daily almond intake body composition , lipid profile , oxidative inflammation indicator among young Korean adult base time almond consumption . Participants randomly assign one three group : ( 1 ) pre-meal group ( PM ; n = 58 ) participant instruct consume 56 g almond per day preload regular meal ; ( 2 ) snack group ( SN ; n =55 ) participant instruct consume 56 g almond meal snack ; ( 3 ) control group ( CL ; n = 56 ) participant provide high-carbohydrate iso-caloric control food . The three-day diet record , include two consecutive weekday one weekend day , do trial twice trial . Body composition assess multi-frequency whole-body bioimpedance measurement use InBody 620 ( Biospace Co. , Ltd , Seoul , Korea ) .After 12-hour fast , blood sample take baseline time point ( week 0 ) week 8 16 standard venipuncture . The serum total cholesterol triglyceride level measure enzymatic-colorimetric method use Cobas 8000 c702 chemistry analyzer ( Roche Diagnostics ; Mannheim , Germany ) . HDL cholesterol LDL cholesterol level determine via homogeneous enzymatic colorimetry .
